import React, { Component } from "react"; import httpService from "../../services/httpService"; import config from "../../config.json"; import { toast } from "react-toastify"; class SupplierTenderList extends Component { state = { tenderList: null, }; async componentDidMount() { try { const { data } = await httpService.get( `${config.apiendpoint}/supplier/myTenderList` ); const { tenderList } = data; await this.setState({ tenderList }); console.log(tenderList); } catch (error) { toast.error(error.message); return; } } renderTenderList = () => { if (this.state.tenders === "") return; let srNo = 0; let styleOfBadge; let tenderList = this.state.tenders.filter( (tender) => tender.isPublished === true ); return tenderList.map((tender) => { srNo++; if (tender.status === "paid") styleOfBadge = "success"; else if (tender.status === "cancelled") styleOfBadge = "danger"; else if (tender.status === "awarded") styleOfBadge = "primary"; else { styleOfBadge = "warning"; } return ( {`#000${srNo}`} {tender._id.toString().substring(18, 24)} {`${tender.creationDate.toString().substring(0, 10)}`} {tender.createdBy} {tender.deliveryLocation} {`${tender.budgetAmount}USD`} {tender.status} ); }); }; render() { return (

#0003 #T686868 5000.00 USD 10-07-2020 20-09-2020 30-09-2020 In Process
#0004 #T686868 5000.00 USD 10-07-2020 20-09-2020 30-09-2020 Cancelled
); } } export default SupplierTenderList;
